## Download

Step 1. Choose a styling framework
- Bootstrap 5
Step 2. Select packages
- DataTables
Extensions
- Buttons
- HTML5 export
- JSZip
- pdfmake

Bagian Download (Klik Tab Download)
- Uncheck Minify
- Uncheck Concantenate

Klik Download Files

## Penataan Files
- Copy isi folder DataTables-xxx (css, images. js) ke folder dist.
- Copy extension (Buttons, JSZip, pdfmake) ke folder extensions
